title: API Governance and Developer Experience in a Developer Portal
author: Aidan O'Connor
description: Lightweight API governance is a fundamental change to the way new APIs are developed, increases developer happiness, lowers costs and speeds time to market.
cntitle: 开发者门户中的 API 治理和开发者体验
cndescription: 轻量级 API 治理是开发新 API 的一种根本性变革，它可以提高开发人员的幸福感，降低成本并加快上市时间。
